Review Questions

  1. Given: 3⋅2a+1⋅8b−10=23\cdot 2^{a+1}\cdot 8^b - 10 = 23⋅2a+1⋅8b−10=2, find a+3ba+3ba+3b.

  2. Evaluate 4log⁡2(5)+log⁡11(114)+20 log⁡20(2005)4^{\log_2(5)} + \log_{11}(11^{4}) + 20^{\, \log_{20}(2005)}4log2​(5)+log11​(114)+20log20​(2005) (Hint: world cup)

  3. Solve for xxx: log⁡(x2)+log⁡(1x)=3\log (x^2) + \log (\frac{1}{x}) = 3log(x2)+log(x1​)=3

  4. Find the domain and range of the function f(x)=2−9−3xf(x)=2-\sqrt{9-3x}f(x)=2−9−3x​.

  5. Consider the functions f(x)=log⁡3(x−1)f(x)=\log_3(x-1)f(x)=log3​(x−1) and g(x)=2x−4g(x)=\sqrt{2x-4}g(x)=2x−4​.
    a. What are the domains of f(x)f(x)f(x) and g(x)g(x)g(x)?
    b. Find f(g(x))f(g(x))f(g(x)) and g(f(x))g(f(x))g(f(x)).
    c. Find the domains of f(g(x))f(g(x))f(g(x)) and g(f(x))g(f(x))g(f(x)).

  6. If the graph of the function f(x)=1−x−1f(x)=1-\sqrt{x-1}f(x)=1−x−1​ is reflected across the y-axis, then shifted 2 units to the right and 3 units upward, then find the equation for the new graph.

  7. If f(x)=3x+4f(x)=\sqrt{3x+4}f(x)=3x+4​ and g(x)=1x−4g(x)=\frac{1}{x-4}g(x)=x−41​, what is the formula for g−1(f(x))g^{-1}(f(x))g−1(f(x)) and what is its domain?

  8. Let the function drawn in the graph below be g(x)g(x)g(x), describe a formula for g(x)g(x)g(x) in terms of f(x)=x2f(x)=x^2f(x)=x2. (Hint: think about function transformations)
